titleStmt.title: A perambulation of Kent conteining the description, hystorie, and customes of that shyre. Collected and written (for the most part) in the yeare. 1570. by William Lambard of Lincolnes Inne Gent. and nowe increased by the addition of some things which the authour him selfe hath obserued since that time.
titleStmt.author: Lambarde, William, 1536-1601.

publicationStmt.publisher: [by H. Middleton] for Ralphe Nevvberie, dwelling in Fleetestreete a litle aboue the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: A variant of the edition with Middleton's name in the colophon.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library, England.

place.placeName: Fleetestreete a litle aboue the Conduit
